metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:0250-1 -- Recommended update for WALinuxAgent
metadata.description:
This update provides WALinuxAgent 1.3, which includes the following fixes and enhancements:
* Improve error checking and robustness of DVD mounting operation during provisioning * Remove redundant check for IP and Port in LoadBalancerProbe * Add check to self.computername to detect empty host name in configuration * Fix initialization script to start the daemon only once * Fix encoding of the README file by converting it to UTF8 and UNIX format * Add README.SUSE to document how the package should be used

extend_definition.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11.x is installed
